args.name: size:#
args.description: sets width and height of game (default: 10)

args.name: mines:#
args.description: sets height of game (default: 15% of size)

commands.name: !ms:mine
commands.description: Mine a tile in tile below the player in an active game

commands.name: !ms:stats
commands.description: Get stats for the game below the player

commands.name: !ms:clearall
commands.description: Clear all bricks and reset game data (config authorized only)

commands.name: !ms:trust
commands.description: Toggle trust of user to play on your active games
